forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun peeks over the city, Downtown San Francisco greets the day with splendid clarity, the azure sky unmarred by the usual marine fog that sometimes rolls in from the Pacific. With temperatures promising to reach a pleasant warmth near 75 degrees before easing into a comfortable evening low of about 54, the atmosphere feels invigorating, buoyed by a gentle northwest breeze that dances through the streets. One might find the air invigorating, tinged with the fresh scent of ocean mist, now absent of the dense fog that often blankets this iconic cityscape.

This morning offers a canvas for exploration; leisurely strolls along the waterfront beckon, while the vivid clarity invites a relaxed breakfast at one of the many outdoor cafes. A light sweater or a light jacket would keep one perfectly shielded from the occasional cool gust, while the sunshine provides just enough warmth to linger outdoors. Whether meandering through the vibrant streets of North Beach or perhaps visiting a hidden art gallery, the day sets itself up for simple pleasures against the backdrop of an enchanting skyline.
